00027 class Quaternion;
00028 
00029 inline Quaternion operator*(Quaternion& R, const Quaternion& S);
00030 
00031 class Quaternion{
00032 public:
00034   Quaternion() 
00035   { 
00036     *q = 1;
00037     std::fill(q + 1, q + 4, 0);
00038     qM = NULL;
00039     is_unit = true;
00040   }
00041 
00043   Quaternion(const my_float_t* in, const size_t len) 
00044   { 
00045     if(len == 4) std::copy(in, in + 4, q); 
00046     // Assume R is orthonormal
00047     else if(len == 9){
00048       const my_float_t* R = in;
00049       my_float_t my_q[4];
00050       my_q[0] = 0.5 * std::sqrt(1 + R[0] + R[4] + R[8]);
00051       my_q[1] = 0.5 * std::sqrt(1 + R[0] - R[4] - R[8]);
00052       my_q[2] = 0.5 * std::sqrt(1 - R[0] + R[4] - R[8]);
00053       my_q[3] = 0.5 * std::sqrt(1 - R[0] - R[4] + R[8]);
00054       
00055       size_t idx = 0;
00056       my_float_t max_val = my_q[0];
00057       for(size_t i = 1; i < 4; ++i)
00058         if(my_q[i] > max_val){
00059           max_val = my_q[i];
00060           idx = i;
00061         }
00062 
00063       q[idx] = my_q[idx];
00064       if(idx == 0){
00065         q[1] = 0.25 * (R[7] - R[5])/q[0];
00066         q[2] = 0.25 * (R[2] - R[6])/q[0];
00067         q[3] = 0.25 * (R[3] - R[1])/q[0];
00068       }else if(idx == 1){
00069         q[0] = 0.25 * (R[7] - R[5])/q[1];
00070         q[2] = 0.25 * (R[3] + R[1])/q[1];
00071         q[3] = 0.25 * (R[2] + R[6])/q[1];
00072       }else if(idx == 2){
00073         q[0] = 0.25 * (R[2] - R[6])/q[2];
00074         q[1] = 0.25 * (R[3] + R[1])/q[2];
00075         q[3] = 0.25 * (R[7] + R[5])/q[2];
00076       }else if(idx == 3){
00077         q[0] = 0.25 * (R[3] - R[1])/q[3];
00078         q[1] = 0.25 * (R[2] + R[6])/q[3];
00079         q[2] = 0.25 * (R[7] + R[5])/q[3];
00080       }
00081 
00082     }else{
00083       std::fill(q, q+4, 0.0);
00084     }
00085     qM = NULL;
00086     is_unit = false;
00087   }
00088 
00091   Quaternion(const my_float_t cos_theta, const my_float_t sin_theta, 
00092              const my_float_t* V)
00093   {
00094     my_float_t cos_half_theta = 1.0;
00095     my_float_t sin_half_theta = 0.0;
00096     if(cos_theta == 1.0){} // do nothing 
00097     else if(cos_theta == -1.0){
00098       cos_half_theta = 0.0;
00099       sin_half_theta = 1.0;
00100     }else{
00101       my_float_t cos_theta_plus_one = cos_theta + 1.0;
00102       cos_half_theta = std::sqrt(0.5 * cos_theta_plus_one);
00103       sin_half_theta = sin_theta / std::sqrt(2 * cos_theta_plus_one);
00104     }
00105     *q = cos_half_theta;
00106     for(uint i = 1; i < 4; ++i) q[i] = sin_half_theta * V[i - 1];
00107     qM = NULL;
00108     is_unit = false;
00109   }
00110 
00113   Quaternion(my_float_t theta0, my_float_t theta1, my_float_t s)
00114   {
00115     my_float_t sigma0 = std::sqrt(1 - s);
00116     my_float_t sigma1 = std::sqrt(s);
00117     q[0] = std::cos(theta1) * sigma1;
00118     q[1] = std::sin(theta0) * sigma0;
00119     q[2] = std::cos(theta0) * sigma0;
00120     q[3] = std::sin(theta1) * sigma1;
00121     qM = NULL;
00122     is_unit = false;  // really should be unit, but just check
00123   }
00124 
00126   Quaternion(const Quaternion& src)
00127   {
00128     do_copy(src);
00129   }
00130 
00131   const Quaternion& 
00132   operator=(const Quaternion& src)
00133   {
00134     if(this != &src) do_copy(src);
00135     return *this;
00136   }

00138 
00139   ~Quaternion() 
00140   { 
00141     if(qM) delete[] qM;
00142     qM = NULL;  
00143   }
00144  
00146   void
00147   get_ortho_rot_mat(my_float_t* R)
00148   {
00149     if(!is_unit) normalize();
00150 
00151     my_float_t q_2[4];
00152     const my_float_t* q_p = q;
00153     my_float_t* q_2_p = q_2;
00154     for(uint i = 0; i < 4; ++i, ++q_p, ++q_2_p) *q_2_p = *q_p*(*q_p);
00155     my_float_t q0qi[3];
00156     for(uint i = 0; i < 3; ++i) q0qi[i] = *q*q[i+1];
00157     my_float_t qxqy = q[1]*q[2];
00158     my_float_t qxqz = q[1]*q[3];
00159     my_float_t qyqz = q[2]*q[3];
00160 
00161     my_float_t *r = R;
00162     *r = q_2[0] + q_2[1] - q_2[2] - q_2[3];
00163     ++r;
00164     *r = 2*(qxqy - q0qi[2]);
00165     ++r;
00166     *r = 2*(qxqz + q0qi[1]);
00167     ++r;
00168     *r = 2*(qxqy + q0qi[2]);
00169     ++r;
00170     *r = q_2[0] - q_2[1] + q_2[2] - q_2[3];
00171     ++r;
00172     *r = 2*(qyqz - *q0qi);
00173     ++r;
00174     *r = 2*(qxqz - q0qi[1]);
00175     ++r;
00176     *r = 2*(qyqz + *q0qi);
00177     ++r;
00178     *r = q_2[0] - q_2[1] - q_2[2] + q_2[3];
00179   }
00180 
00182   inline my_float_t 
00183   normalize()
00184   {
00185     if(is_unit) return 1.0;
00186 
00187     // Change the first component to be positive
00188     my_float_t* qp = q;
00189     if(*qp < 0.0)
00190       for(size_t i = 0; i < 4; ++i, ++qp) (*qp) *= -1.0;
00191     qp = q;
00192 
00193     // Make the quaternion a unit quaternion
00194     my_float_t mag = 0;
00195     for(uint i = 0; i < 4; ++i, ++qp) mag += *qp * (*qp);
00196     mag = std::sqrt(mag);
00197     if(mag != 1.0){
00198       qp = q;
00199       for(uint i = 0; i < 4; ++i, ++qp) *qp /= mag;
00200     }
00201     is_unit = true;
00202     return mag;
00203   }
00204 
00206   Quaternion
00207   conjugate()
00208   {
00209     Quaternion rv = *this;
00210     my_float_t* qp = rv.q + 1;
00211     for(uint i = 1; i < 4; ++i, ++qp) *qp *= -1.0;
00212     return rv;
00213   }

00216   std::string str();
00217 
00219   void
00220   get_parameters(my_float_t *theta0, my_float_t* theta1, my_float_t *s)
00221   {
00222     *theta0 = atan2(q[1], q[2]);
00223     *theta1 = atan2(q[3], q[0]);
00224     *s = q[3]*q[3] + q[0]*q[0];
00225   }
00226 
00229 
00233   void
00234   randomize()
00235   {
00236     my_float_t s = std::rand() / static_cast<my_float_t>(RAND_MAX);
00237     my_float_t sigma0 = std::sqrt(1 - s);
00238     my_float_t sigma1 = std::sqrt(s);
00239     my_float_t theta0 = 2*M_PI * 
00240       (std::rand() / static_cast<my_float_t>(RAND_MAX));
00241     my_float_t theta1 = 2*M_PI * 
00242       (std::rand() / static_cast<my_float_t>(RAND_MAX));
00243     q[0] = std::cos(theta1) * sigma1;
00244     q[1] = std::sin(theta0) * sigma0;
00245     q[2] = std::cos(theta0) * sigma0;
00246     q[3] = std::sin(theta1) * sigma1;
00247     is_unit = true;
00248   }
00249 
00251 
00258   void 
00259   randomize(my_float_t theta_beg, my_float_t theta_end)
00260   {
00261     const my_float_t half_width = 0.5 * RAND_MAX;
00262     my_float_t v[3];
00263     for(size_t i = 0; i < 3; ++i) 
00264       v[i] = ((std::rand() - half_width) / RAND_MAX);
00265     
00266     my_float_t tmp = (std::rand() - half_width) / half_width;
00267     my_float_t half_theta = 0;
00268     if(tmp > 0)
00269       half_theta = theta_beg + tmp*(theta_end - theta_beg);
00270     else 
00271       half_theta = -1*theta_end - tmp*(theta_end - theta_beg);    
00272     
00273     half_theta /= 2.0;
00274     my_float_t cos_half_theta = std::cos(half_theta);
00275     my_float_t sin_half_theta = std::sin(half_theta);
00276     
00277     q[0] = cos_half_theta;
00278     q[1] = v[0] * sin_half_theta;
00279     q[2] = v[1] * sin_half_theta;
00280     q[3] = v[2] * sin_half_theta; 
00281     is_unit = false;
00282   }
00283 
00284   friend Quaternion operator*(Quaternion& r, const Quaternion& s);
00285 
00286   friend my_float_t distance(Quaternion& r, Quaternion& s, 
00287                              const my_float_t W = 1.0);
00288 private:
00289 
00291   void
00292   fill_qM()
00293   {
00294     if(qM) delete[] qM;
00295     qM = new my_float_t[16];
00296     *qM = *(qM + 5) = *(qM + 10) = *(qM + 15) = *q;
00297     for(uint i = 1; i < 4; ++i){
00298       qM[i] = -q[i];
00299       qM[4*i] = q[i];
00300     } 
00301     qM[6] = -q[3];
00302     qM[7] = q[2];
00303     qM[9] = q[3];
00304     qM[11] = -q[1];
00305     qM[13] = -q[2];
00306     qM[14] = q[1];
00307   }
00308 
00309   void 
00310   do_copy(const Quaternion& src)
00311   {
00312     std::copy(src.q, src.q + 4, q);
00313     is_unit = src.is_unit;
00314     qM = NULL;
00315   }
00316 
00317   my_float_t q[4];
00318   my_float_t* qM;  
00319   bool is_unit;
00320 };
00321 
00323 
00325 inline Quaternion
00326 operator*(Quaternion& R, const Quaternion& S)
00327 {
00328   Quaternion RS;
00329   // Alwasy assume is not a unit vector just to force normalization after
00330   // any positve number of multiplications
00331   RS.is_unit = false;
00332  
00333   if(R.qM == NULL) R.fill_qM();
00334   // Stupid ciruclar dependance here which should go away soon
00335   //my_gemv(4, 4, 1.0, R.qM, 4, S.q, 1, 0, RS.q, 1);
00336   std::fill(RS.q, RS.q + 4, 0);
00337   for(uint i = 0; i < 4; ++i)
00338     for(uint j = 0; j < 4; ++j)
00339       RS.q[i] += R.qM[4*i + j] * S.q[j];
00340   return RS; 
00341 }
00342 
00344 inline my_float_t
00345 distance(Quaternion& r, Quaternion& s, const my_float_t W)
00346 {
00347   r.normalize();
00348   s.normalize();
00349   my_float_t rv = 0.0;
00350   for(size_t i = 0; i < 4; ++i) rv += r.q[i] * s.q[i]; 
00351   if(rv < 0.0) rv *= -1.0;  
00352   return W * (1.0 - rv);
00353 }
